title: Login Problem (VPN)
body:
Hello guys :)

It's been a week since the last time I logged in into the game, because the launcher remains frozen with the writing "Logging on".

I'm using a VPN connection to bypass some router's limitations and i figured out that using my phone as a router without VPN allows me to successfully log in into the game.
This is the first time that something like this happens, since I already played lots of matches using the same VPN, but i noticed that everything started when the launcher animation first changed into the Cup one for the LOL Mondials.

Any help?

Many thanks :)

replies.body:
If you're not able to login both with or without a VPN, then there are likely big issues along your route to the server that are preventing you from logging in. Since you specifically mentioned there are limitations on your router, I recommend trying another router to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if this causes any change.
I already said that with the phone i can log in normally into the game, so i think it's a VPN problem. I use two VPN servers (freevpn.me/vpnbook.com) and I have the same issue with both of them.
Can you connect while on your home network **without** a VPN enabled at all?
